More Informations Last refurbishment in 2012.
ALL HOTEL'S SERVICES, ENTERTAINMENT and ALL INCLUSIVE TREATMENT TAKE PLACE AT “PUNTA NORD VILLAGE 4****” of the same management, located only 20mt away from Residenza Punta Nord.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. Lunch and dinner on buffet with fruit or dessert.
Conference room with maximum capacity of 800 person.
Two swimming pools: 1 for adults and 1 for children, opening period from 31.05.14 to 06.09.14 (opening hours from 09:00-12:30 and 14:30-18:30).
In addition, hotel got boccia camp free of charge,game point with table football and table tennis, small pine grove, volleyball camp, tennis court and football court free of charge, it is one court for all three sports!
From 07/06/14 to 31/08/14, daily entertainment for adults and children, Theme party once a week.Theme party once a week; Music party once a week; Gastronomic party once a week.
MINICLUB open from 07/06/14 to 31/08/14 from 10 a.m. to 12 midday and from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. for kids from 4 years old.
PRICES includes: use of Jacuzzi, beach service from 31/05/14 to 09/09/2014 with 1 sun umbrella + 2 sun beds per room (single room 1 sun umbrella+1 sun bed) , unlimited beverages on tap during meals (water, wine, beer, soft drinks) and open bar from 08 am to 9 pm with water, wine, beer, soft drinks, fruit juices, and american coffee, all on tap + main spirits.
Credit cards accepted: eurocard/Mastercard, American Express and Visa. Check in from 14:00 Check out by 10:00
